kpi_info.title: TRANSMITTED CODE POWER CLASS 0
kpi_info.use: The number of received Dedicated Measurement Reports received from the WBTS in which the Transmitted Code Power (TxCdPwr) value is inside Class 0 range. The mapping to power value depends on WCEL parameter PRACHDelayRange setting (5 km range): 0<=TxCdPwr<5 dBm; 10 km range: 0<=TxCdPwr<5 dBm; 20 km range: 0<=TxCdPwr<5 dBm; 60 km range: 0<=TxCdPwr<5 dBm; 180 km range: 0<=TxCdPwr<6 dBm. UPDATED: When an NBAP: DEDICATED MEASUREMENT REPORT message is received from the WBTS and the reported Transmitted Code Power value is inside Class 0 range.
